description:
While running the test suite everything passes, but this gets tossed out at the end:

...
Ran 79 tests in 37.389s

PASSED (successes=79)
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/multiprocessing/util.py", line 235, in _run_finalizers
    finalizer()
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/multiprocessing/util.py", line 174, in __call__
    res = self._callback(*self._args, **self._kwargs)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/multiprocessing/pool.py", line 384, in _terminate_pool
    p.join()
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/multiprocessing/process.py", line 119, in join
    res = self._popen.wait(timeout)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/multiprocessing/forking.py", line 117, in wait
    return self.poll(0)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/multiprocessing/forking.py", line 106, in poll
    pid, sts = os.waitpid(self.pid, flag)
OSError: [Errno 4] Interrupted system call
title: Interrupted system call during test suite

comments.content:
While running the test suite everything passes, but this gets tossed out at the end:

...
Ran 79 tests in 37.389s

PASSED (successes=79)
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/multiprocessing/util.py", line 235, in _run_finalizers
    finalizer()
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/multiprocessing/util.py", line 174, in __call__
    res = self._callback(*self._args, **self._kwargs)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/multiprocessing/pool.py", line 384, in _terminate_pool
    p.join()
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/multiprocessing/process.py", line 119, in join
    res = self._popen.wait(timeout)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/multiprocessing/forking.py", line 117, in wait
    return self.poll(0)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/multiprocessing/forking.py", line 106, in poll
    pid, sts = os.waitpid(self.pid, flag)
OSError: [Errno 4] Interrupted system call
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~eday

comments.content:
Do you have the patched python-twisted from the PPA installed?

-- 
Soren Hansen
Ubuntu Developer
http://www.ubuntu.com/
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~soren

comments.content:
You need a version of Twisted that  includes this patchset:

    http://twistedmatrix.com/trac/changeset/28447

It is included in 10.1.0 and in the 10.0.0 version in the PPA.

This should probably be "fixed" by adding a list of dependencies.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~soren

comments.content: Thanks! I am not using the PPA and just what was in pypi, so that's it.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~eday
